content:
PartialClassGenerationTask Class

In this Article

Accesses XAML files that define types (with x:Class) and generates the corresponding source code that can be compiled into an assembly.

Syntax

Declaration

public class PartialClassGenerationTask : Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task
  • PartialClassGenerationTask

Inherited Members

BuildEngine
,
BuildEngine2
,
BuildEngine3
,
BuildEngine4
,
HelpKeywordPrefix
,
HostObject
,
Log
,
TaskResources
,
Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

The XAML files processed by this task define new types as well as instantiate those types. The PartialClassGenerationTask class reads in the new type definitions and generates source code files. In addition, it generates a XAML file that contains the markup that instantiates the newly generated types.

This task should not be used to consume untrusted XAML inputs.

Constructors summary

PartialClassGenerationTask()

Initializes a new instance of the PartialClassGenerationTask class.

Properties summary

ApplicationMarkup

Gets or sets a list of XAML files to process, populated by MS Build.
AssemblyName

Gets or sets the name of the assembly being compiled.
BuildTaskPath

Gets or sets the path of the assembly that contains this build task.
GeneratedCodeFiles

Gets or sets a list of generated code files, one for each input file.
GeneratedResources

Gets or sets a list of XAML files that contain the markup for instantiating the newly generated types, one for each input file.
GeneratedSourceExtension

Gets or sets the file extension to add to the generated source files.
IsInProcessXamlMarkupCompile

Gets or sets whether the compilation of XAML markup is in process.
KnownReferencePaths

Gets or sets the known reference paths.
Language

Gets or sets the language to generate source code in.
MSBuildProjectDirectory

Gets or sets the directory of MS build project.
OutputPath

Gets or sets the directory to place the generated files.
References

Gets or sets a list of assemblies to reference.
RequiresCompilationPass2

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this project requires executing the CompilationPass2Task task.
RootNamespace

Gets or sets the root namespace for the project.
SourceCodeFiles

Gets or sets a list of source code files in the project.
XamlBuildTypeGenerationExtensionNames

Gets or sets the collection of extension names used in XAML build type generation.
XamlBuildTypeInspectionExtensionNames

Gets or sets the collection of extension names used in XAML build type inspection.

Methods summary

Execute()

Called by MS Build to execute the code generation task.

Constructors

  • PartialClassGenerationTask()

    Initializes a new instance of the PartialClassGenerationTask class.

    public PartialClassGenerationTask ();

Properties

  • ApplicationMarkup

    Gets or sets a list of XAML files to process, populated by MS Build.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] ApplicationMarkup { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      A list of ITaskItem that represents the XAML files to process.

  • AssemblyName

    Gets or sets the name of the assembly being compiled.

    public string AssemblyName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the assembly being compiled.

    Remarks

    This property is only set when processing root-only XAML files.

  • BuildTaskPath

    Gets or sets the path of the assembly that contains this build task.

    public string BuildTaskPath { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The build task path.

  • GeneratedCodeFiles

    Gets or sets a list of generated code files, one for each input file.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] GeneratedCodeFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      A list of ITaskItem that represents the source XAML files.

  • GeneratedResources

    Gets or sets a list of XAML files that contain the markup for instantiating the newly generated types, one for each input file.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] GeneratedResources { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      A list of ITaskItem that represents the generated XAML files.

  • GeneratedSourceExtension

    Gets or sets the file extension to add to the generated source files.

    public string GeneratedSourceExtension { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The file extension.

  • IsInProcessXamlMarkupCompile

    Gets or sets whether the compilation of XAML markup is in process.

    public bool IsInProcessXamlMarkupCompile { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      True if the compilation of XAML markup is in process; otherwise, false.

  • KnownReferencePaths

    Gets or sets the known reference paths.

    public string[] KnownReferencePaths { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String[]

      The known reference paths.

  • Language

    Gets or sets the language to generate source code in.

    public string Language { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The language to generate source code in.

  • MSBuildProjectDirectory

    Gets or sets the directory of MS build project.

    public string MSBuildProjectDirectory { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The directory of MS build project.

  • OutputPath

    Gets or sets the directory to place the generated files.

    public string OutputPath { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The directory that stores the generated files.

  • References

    Gets or sets a list of assemblies to reference.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] References { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      A list of ITaskItem that represents referenced assemblies.

  • RequiresCompilationPass2

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this project requires executing the CompilationPass2Task task.

    public bool RequiresCompilationPass2 { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if there are unresolved types; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    While processing the XAML files, the PartialClassGenerationTask looks for unresolved types. If it finds any, it launches the CompilationPass2Task that compiles all of the XAML files in the project and checks to make sure all types are resolved.

  • RootNamespace

    Gets or sets the root namespace for the project.

    public string RootNamespace { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The root namespace.

  • SourceCodeFiles

    Gets or sets a list of source code files in the project.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] SourceCodeFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      A list of ITaskItem that represents the source code files in the project.

  • XamlBuildTypeGenerationExtensionNames

    Gets or sets the collection of extension names used in XAML build type generation.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] XamlBuildTypeGenerationExtensionNames { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The collection of extension names used.

  • XamlBuildTypeInspectionExtensionNames

    Gets or sets the collection of extension names used in XAML build type inspection.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] XamlBuildTypeInspectionExtensionNames { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The collection of extension names used.

Methods

  • Execute()

    Called by MS Build to execute the code generation task.

    public override bool Execute ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the code is generated successfully; otherwise, false.
